The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 13 April is 311,922 (35,950.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 April, there were 237 new confirmed cases (27.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 April, there were 283 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 16% (46 fewer cases).
